title: Marinara
description: A simple tomato sauce will never go out of style.

title: Three-Cheese
description: Grated Emmentaler, Gruyere or Edam and the same amount of mozzarella or fontina.

title: Cherry Tomato Couscous Salad
description: A mix of jammy roasted cherry tomatoes and juicy fresh ones makes this guy one of my favorite summer salads. With spiced roasted chickpeas, tangy feta, and big pearls of couscous, it’s hearty enough to be a meal on its own.

title: Spaghetti
description: When you're craving a comfort food, nothing—I repeat, NOTHING—will cure you like creamy spaghetti  carbonara.

title: Chocolate Pudding
description: A smooth, creamy, and rich pudding.

title: Ginger ale
description: A carbonated soft drink flavoured with ginger
